detail_desc: Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Thin metal snake chain necklaces with rectangular pendants in metal and plastic. Adjustable length 50-57 cm and 75-82 cm.
Sleeveless top in soft, gently draping silk with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and a narrow cut at the back. Lined.
Jacket in cotton canvas with a collar and cuffs in corduroy. Shoulder tabs with a button, buttons down the front, and a chest pocket and two front pockets, all with a flap and button. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Moccasins knitted in yarn containing glittery threads with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft leather soles.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Imitation leather hi-tops with shimmering appliqués, elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Satin top with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and crossover straps at the back. Lined at the top.
Short necklace in metal with small round pendants. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Pool shoes with a hook and loop fastener and grained rubber soles. (Sizes 7-9 with an elastic strap around the heels.)
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the waist and hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, pattern-knit wool and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with short sleeves.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow elasticated seam under the bust and long, puff sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.
Flared skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with smocking at the waist.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Small straw bag with two handles at the top, an imitation leather shoulder strap and a sewn-in lining with a drawstring at the top. Size approx. 15x20x24 cm.
Straight-cut shirt in soft cotton poplin with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and two slits at the front. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in organic cotton with a wrapover front and lace-trimmed elastic at the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck.
Metal rings decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Short, high-waisted skirt in suede with decorative seams. Visible zip and a concealed button at the back. Lined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in a patterned weave with elastication at the top and short, flounced trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jacket in soft printed thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and concealed zip down the front. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Shortie briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Waistcoat in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar, buttons down the front and a text print on the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long skirt in patterned, pleated mesh with an elasticated waist. Jersey underskirt.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons at the front, an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Vest tops in organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a collar and button placket.
Jersey top with elastication at the top and short, wide, raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise.
Cycling shorts in patterned jersey with a high waist with covered elastic.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short flounced sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam with ties at the waist. Partly lined.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped key pocket at the back, ventilating mesh sections on the legs and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

V-neck blouse in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front in a loose fit at the top with pleats that taper to a seam at the waist. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams underneath and buttoned cuffs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Cardigan in a loose, chunky, crocheted cotton blend. V-shaped opening at the top, buttons down the front, a tie belt at the waist and patch front pockets. The cardigan is heavy and should be stored flat to retain its shape.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Wide jacket in washed organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a pima cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved dress in a jacquard knit with a fastening at the back, seam at the hips and a glittery tulle skirt. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Jersey inner skirt.
Hat in braided paper straw with a twisted band with appliqués and a raw-edge brim. Width of brim 7.5 cm.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle that folds up with a button on the handle. Matching case. Length 30 cm folded.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.

Blouse in airy chiffon with glittery spots. Slightly wider neckline with gathers at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Smocking at the front of the hem and a slit and ties at the back.

Straight-cut coat in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a tie belt at the waist and patch pockets. Unlined.
